testcase.name: Create Producer with unauthorized user

failure.message: 1 expectation failed. Expected status code <200> but was <401>.

testcase.failure: java.lang.AssertionError: 1 expectation failed. Expected status code <200> but was <401>.
testcase.system-out:
@ApiTESTING Scenario: Create Producer with unauthorized user # src/test/java/scenarios/CucumberTests.feature:44 Given user try to create producer with next data: # ApiTestingSteps.givenDataToProducer(java.util.List<java.util.List<java.lang.String>>) TOKEN Request URI: https://sewingplatform.herokuapp.com/manage_producer Body: { "image": "undefined", "new_image": "false", "producer_name": "Test producer", "types": "1", "steps": "1", "region_id": "1", "description": "Test test test test test" } When unauthorized user try to create producer # ApiTestingSteps.unauthorizedUserCreateNewProducer() Then user receive status code 200 # ApiTestingSteps.compareStatusCodes(int) java.lang.AssertionError: 1 expectation failed. Expected status code <200> but was <401>.
